title: Create E2E browser tests against wrangler dev
description:
Extend E2E test suite to also run against wrangler dev with real DO.

Create: internal/tickboard/ui/e2e/cloud-e2e.sh

Tests should cover same scenarios as comms-e2e.sh but:
- Connect to wrangler dev instead of test rig directly
- Verify full round-trip through DO
- Test rig acts as local agent

Scenarios:
- SSE/WebSocket connections through Worker
- Tick CRUD operations via DO
- Local agent status updates
- Run stream subscription
acceptance_criteria: E2E tests pass against wrangler dev with test rig as local agent
closed_reason: Created cloud-e2e.sh that runs E2E tests against wrangler dev with real DOs. The script: (1) starts wrangler dev via wrangler-ctl.sh, (2) sets up test auth via setup-cloud-auth.sh, (3) starts test rig with --upstream pointing to wrangler dev, (4) waits for upstream connection, (5) runs cloud-specific tests including tick CRUD through DO, sync verification, and run stream subscription, (6) cleans up all processes on exit. Tests mirror comms-e2e.sh scenarios but verify full round-trip through the cloud stack.
